action.action-desc: Mr. Huffman (for himself, Mr. Levin, Ms. Barragán, Ms. Bonamici, Mr. Khanna, Mr. Connolly, Ms. Jacobs, Mr. Kilmer, Mr. Peters, Ms. Brownley, Mr. Blumenauer, and Ms. Jayapal) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act to prohibit oil and gas leasing in certain areas of the Outer Continental Shelf.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the North Pacific Ocean Protection Act of 2023.

section.header: Prohibition of oil and gas leasing in certain areas of the Outer Continental Shelf
section.text: Section 8 of the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act (43 U.S.C. 1337) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.header: Prohibition of oil and gas leasing in certain areas of the Outer Continental Shelf
subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this section or any other law, the Secretary of the Interior may not issue a lease for the exploration, development, or production of oil or natural gas in the Washington/Oregon planning area, the Northern California planning area, or the Central California planning area (as such planning areas are described in the document entitled 2019â€“2024 National OCS Oil and Gas Leasing Draft Proposed Program, dated January 2018, or a subsequent oil and gas leasing program developed under section 18 of this Act.
